SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT097
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is used by the Copy destination in FINCopy and FINInform services to authorise or reject message delivery.
From: Copy destination To: FIN

SystemField.Name: original-user-message-reference
SystemField.description:
Original Message Reference (MRF) of the corresponding MT 096 FIN Copy to to Server Destination Message, containing:
a) GMT date and time of the input message acceptance (12 characters).
b) Original message MIR (28 characters).

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: original-user-message-reference
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Original Message Reference (MRF) of the corresponding MT 096 FIN Copy to to Server Destination Message, containing:
a) GMT date and time of the input message acceptance (12 characters).
b) Original message MIR (28 characters).

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Date '" + $value + "'. date should be in the format yyMMdd."
"Invalid Time '" + $value + "'.full-time should be in the format HHmmss."

SystemField.Name: accept-reject
SystemField.description:
Accepted or rejected, where:
a) 0 = accepted
b) 1 = rejected

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: accept-reject
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:

SystemField.Name: abort-reason
SystemField.description: Service-specific reason for the message refusal. See FIN Error Codes for the full set of error codes.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: abort-reason
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Reason for the abort, and, for the FINCopy service, reason for message refusals. See the FIN Error Codes for the full set of error codes.

SystemField.Name: payment-release-information-sender
SystemField.description: Information from server destination to sender of payment message.Tag 114 with only blanks (spaces) is accepted by the system.

SystemField.Name: sanctions-screening-information-receiver
SystemField.description:
Screening results and additional information inserted by the compliance officer.
AOK - message automatically released by screening service
FPO - compliance officer has flagged the screening result as false positive
NOK - compliance officer has flagged the message as suspect
